amendment.description: To limit the amount available for the Victims Compensation Fund.

vote.text: Amendment SA 928, under the order of 7/18/19, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 32 - 66. Record Vote Number: 222.

action.text: Amendment SA 928 proposed by Senator Lee. (consideration: CR S4997-4998; text: CR S4997) To limit the amount available for the Victims Compensation Fund.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 928 proposed by Senator Lee.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 928, under the order of 7/18/19, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 32 - 66. Record Vote Number: 222.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 928, under the order of 7/18/19, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 32 - 66. Record Vote Number: 222.
